relation: Purchase TV shows on Apple TV. Shows purchased on Apple TV can be redownloaded on other iOS devices. Shows purchased on other iOS devices or with iTunes automatically show up as available to play on Apple TV. Feature limited by region. Learn more.

Apple TV Software Update 7.0—Apple TV (3rd generation) only Feature Summary Refreshed user experience A fresh new look for Apple TV. Family Sharing Play your family’s purchases. Ask to Buy Make sure children get permission before buying items from iTunes. Descriptive Video Services Hear descriptive video with a new accessibility feature coming to select iTunes movies and TV shows later this year. Peer-to-peer AirPlay Guests can AirPlay from their Mac or iOS device directly to your Apple TV (model A1469 or later) without connecting to your wireless network. Beats Music Listen to music that's always right for you. Software update 7.0 is available only for Apple TV (3rd generation). Find
